title: Trump's policies putting America first?
shortDescription: Do Donald Trump's policies put America first? Marjorie Taylor Greene thinks not. Here's what we know now.

title: Melania Trump hosts state dinner. What else has she done as first lady?
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump was thanked by the president during the state dinner for the Saudi crown price. When did she meet Donald? What has she done?

title: Elon Musk quietly returns to White House as feud with Trump fades
shortDescription: Elon Musk was among the guests at a White House dinner for the Saudi crown prince, signifying the end of his bitter feud with President Trump.

title: Biden plans to attend Dick Cheney's funeral
shortDescription: Cheney's funeral is slated to take place at the Washington National Cathedral in Washington on Nov. 20.

title: Khashoggi’s widow calls out Trump
shortDescription: Hanan Elatr Khashoggi calls for justice and condemns President Donald Trump’s defense of Saudi crown prince following journalist Jamal Khashoggi’s 2018 killing.

title: Federal judge blocks newly drawn Texas congressional map
shortDescription: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is asking for the Supreme Court's help to settle a court battle over a redistricting map.

title: Trump rolls out red carpet for Saudi prince
shortDescription: Elon Musk and several other tech giants attended the black-tie, candlelit White House dinner.

title: When could Trump sign bill to release Epstein files? Live updates
shortDescription: Only one lawmaker out of hundreds objected on Tuesday to fully releasing the Epstein files.

title: A funeral for Cheney, and the 'adults-in-the-room' GOP establishment
shortDescription: Cheney's death highlights the waning of a more traditional, establishment-oriented version of the GOP that dominated for decades.

title: Convicted fraudster pardoned by Trump sentenced to 37 years in prison
shortDescription: President Donald Trump commuted Eliyahu "Eli'' Weinstein's 24-year prison term in 2021. Upon his release, Weinstein was at it again, authorities said.

title: $1 trillion man: Trump woos Saudi prince at White House dinner
shortDescription: President Trump gave Saudi Prince Mohammed bin Salman the royal treatment, and the dignitary gave the US $1 trillion.

title: Trump hosts Saudi Prince Mohammed bin Salman at White House dinner
shortDescription: Trump is hosting the Saudi prince for meetings aimed at strengthening economic and defense ties.

title: Trump defends Saudi crown prince on human rights in White House visit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he would sell Saudi Arabia the advanced F-35 fighter jet in a deal that has raised alarms among security experts.

title: Rep. Ro Khanna comments on Epstein bill passing
shortDescription: Rep. Ro Khanna of California, one of the congressmen behind the Epstein bill, comments on the message the bill passing the House sends.

title: Trump official reportedly intervened in Tate probe
shortDescription: An investigation from ProPublica claims a Trump official intervened in the investigation into influencer Andrew Tate.

title: See the emotional moment Congress voted to release the Epstein files
shortDescription: The legislation instructs the U.S. Department of Justice to release all files related to the late accused sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Senate unanimously passes Epstein bill
shortDescription: The U.S. Senate unanimously agreed to pass the Epstein Files Transparency Act, sending the bill to President Trump's desk for his signature.
